creator: lkishalmi@ovi.com
text:
I've ported the complete set of catalina launchers to OS/2 and wish to
contribute them.
Where can I upload them?

Thanks,

Laszlo Kishalmi

creator: lkishalmi@ovi.com
text:
Created attachment 12832
The complete set of launchers.

creator: lkishalmi@ovi.com
text: Note. The line end characters should be CR/LF!

creator: jkacer@kiv.zcu.cz
text:
Hello,

I created the OS/2 scripts some time ago too. They are available at
http://hobbes.nmsu.edu/pub/os2/apps/internet/www/server/tomcat_5-0-27_os2.zip

Another person also created non-Rexx scripts that should also work. Check the
OS/2 FAQ page for links.

I also asked officialy for adding my scripts to the distribution but it was
rejected because OS/2 is not officialy supported and there are too few users
running OS/2. You may ask Yoav Shapira (via Tomcat-dev list) to add a link to
your scripts too.

Actually I'm working on NetBeans OS/2 support. It is also non-official, but
they didn't argue about the small number of users.
I'm trying to solve http://www.netbeans.org/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=42678
and I'm close to it.
This Tomcat issue blocks that NetBeans issue.
I don't think they would agree to add these scripts to their embedded tomcat.
creator: lkishalmi@ovi.com
lkishalmi@ovi.com
text:
The improved launchers provide all the functionality the linux/unix launchers
offer. 
The only drawback is the xxx-using-launcher.cmd scripts have to set wait property
to true, as there are some platform compatibility issues in commons-launcher.

creator: lkishalmi@ovi.com
text:
Created attachment 13259
OS/2 Launchers for contrib/os2

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
Will not be done.  We don't want to maintain these, and the idea of adding a 
contrib directory to Tomcat was not liked by committers.  Feel free to add your 
scripts to our wiki.  Our FAQ also points users to the wiki for additional OS-
specific resources
